name: Santa Returns
description:
This game was based off of a conversation I had with a friend back in university, where I drew Santa with an eyepatch and a gun in MS Paint. I called that Santa OC "Sant Shoot". I thought it would be funny to make a game based on that concept. I hope you enjoy your time with it :)

Credits

Santa Sprite: https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-santa-sprites

Ronald Sprite: https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-patreon-collection

Environment and Buildings: https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-farm

Music: Eric the Funny Baron (https://eric-the-funny-baron.itch.io/barons-music-pack)

Train tracks: https://turbo-developement-team.itch.io/2d-top-down-freight-train-assets

Skull Icon: https://sijansur.itch.io/skull01

Present Sparkle Effect: https://codemanu.itch.io/pixelart-effect-pack

Gun Sounds: https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-authentic-gun-sounds and https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-second-authentic-gun-sounds-pack

Explosion Visual Effect: https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

Guns: https://midnitepixelated.itch.io/pixel-guns

SFX: https://darkworldaudio.itch.io/sound-effects-survival-i and https://coloralpha.itch.io/50-menu-interface-sfx

Reindeer, Christmas Trees: https://finalbossblues.itch.io/christmas-graphics

Keyboard Icons: https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys

Elf, Santa Enemies: Can't find the credit, but I didn't make them

All other assets and code created by me.
